alert.note: Alert for Pend Oreille (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued September 29 at 11:57AM PDT until September 30 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE ON BOX CANYON DAM ON THE PEND OREILLE RIVER IN EFFECT THIS FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam releases of Box Canyon Dam is possible on the Pend Oreille River. * WHERE...A portion of Northeast Washington, including Pend Oreille county. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Increased releases may result in flash flooding of low-lying areas below the dam, especially to Metaline and Metaline Falls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Flows have increased from the Box Canyon Dam from 16 kcfs to 60 kcfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
